scripts.test:
git rebase development || echo "\x1b[104m\x1b[97m
Error: no test specified\x1b[0m
 sdsd " && exit 1
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run update-development
scripts.update-development:
git rebase master development || echo "\x1b[104m\x1b[97m
Error: no test specified\x1b[0m
 sdsd " && exit 1 && git push
